content: The eternal paradox of peak performance in chess, or any endeavor, really, is how to learn from your failures while still carrying on as if you are invincible. You must learn and forget simultaneously.
translations: ita:L'eterno paradosso delle massime prestazioni negli scacchi, o in qualsiasi altra impresa, Ã¨ sapere come capitalizzare i
